# Generated by binpac_quickstart

project(Zeek-Plugin-LDAP)

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8)

if ( NOT ZEEK_DIST )
    message(FATAL_ERROR "ZEEK_DIST not set")
endif ()

set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${ZEEK_DIST}/cmake)

include(ZeekPlugin)

zeek_plugin_begin(Zeek LDAP)
zeek_plugin_cc(src/Plugin.cc)
zeek_plugin_cc(src/LDAP.cc)
zeek_plugin_bif(src/events.bif)
zeek_plugin_bif(src/types.bif)
zeek_plugin_pac(src/ldap.pac src/ldap-analyzer.pac src/ldap-protocol.pac)
zeek_plugin_end()
